title: Deep Breathing
description: Slow, controlled breathing to calm the nervous system

title: Here & Now
description: Use Mindful Observation to focus on the moment

title: Self-Care (PLEASE)
description: Ensure you are taking care of yourself

title: Positive Self-Talk
description: Kind, encouraging words to yourself

title: STOP Skill
description: Stop, Take a breath, Observe, Proceed mindfully

title: Distraction Activities
description: Engage in activities that shift your focus

title: Problem Solving
description: Use problem solving to address any challenges with clarity and intention

title: Self-Soothing
description: Use your senses to comfort yourself

title: TIPP Skills
description: Temperature, Intense exercise, Paced breathing, Paired muscle relaxation

title: Radical Acceptance
description: Accept reality without fighting it

title: Different Action
description: Act opposite to your emotional urges

title: Grounding Techniques
description: 5-4-3-2-1 technique to stay present

title: Crisis Support
description: Open the 'Crisis Support' page to reach out for help

title: Crisis Survival
description: Use your favorite distress tolerance skills like TIPP or Different Action

title: Half Smile
description: Relax facial muscles to promote calm

title: Willing Hands
description: Open posture to embrace acceptance

title: DEAR MAN
description: Assertive communication technique

title: GIVE
description: Gentle, Interested, Validate, Easy manner

title: Check the Facts
description: Examine if emotions fit the facts

title: Wise Mind
description: Balance emotion and reason
